/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The buildings lining the street are tall and modern, their glass and steel facades reflecting the sunlight. The street itself is lined with trees, adding a touch of green to the urban landscape. Cars can be seen moving along the road, their colors muted under the bright sunlight. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of looking up at the cityscape.
